org.hps.analysis.dataquality

Class SVTHitMCEfficiency

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.analysis.dataquality.DataQualityMonitor
        • org.hps.analysis.dataquality.SVTHitMCEfficiency

  • public class SVTHitMCEfficiency
extends DataQualityMonitor
    DQM driver for the monte carlo SVT hit efficiency April 29 -- first pass, makes the SimTrackerHits-->SiClusters efficiency vs position (with a settable t0 cut)
